subject: Vam Pro Issues
description_text:
Heyo!

I recently received my order of Vam Pro reactors, I have plugged them into
my Pro X base, and plugged the power cord in as well. When I open the
Simsonn software and the SimHub software, the reactors are visible, but I
am unable to get any vibrations out of them when using the
available testing buttons. I also attempted it in a handful of games, and
non of them are triggering the haptics either. Any help would be greatly
appreciated. Thank you!

-- 
Jacob Pedigo

conversations.body_text: Hi Jake P.,  In the “Settings – Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the prox.sfu file to update. After the update, please test the device again.
